ModMetaData.name: Meal Printer
ModMetaData.author: SomewhereOutInSpace
ModMetaData.description: Meal Printer aims to enable simple, balanced automated meal production to Rimworld's mid and late game. This mod adds the titular meal printer, the spacer descendant of the classic nutrient paste dispensers. Printers can produce simple or fine meals (the latter albeit at a hefty nutrient efficiency penalty), and can also be configured for high-efficiency nutrient paste or bulk NutriBar production.
